directions: Cook pasta in a large pot of boiling salted water until al dente.
Crumble goat cheese into a large serving bowl.  Add arugula, cherry tomatoes, olive oil, garlic, and salt and pepper.
Drain pasta, and toss with goat cheese mixture.
ingredients: 2 cups coarsely chopped arugula, stems included
title: Goat Cheese and Arugula over Penne
